Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.io

Class IO

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.io.IO
public class IO extends Object
Utility methods for buffering, closing, copying and flushing streams.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

    • copy

      public static boolean copy​(InputStream input, OutputStream output, IO.CopyStyle style)
      Copy an input stream to an output stream. The streams will be automatically buffered for efficiency if they are not already buffered when IO.CopyStyle is IO.CopyStyle.BUFFERED. Note that there is no ProgressReporter argument to this method even though it could take a long time. The reason is that resources are opened using a progress reporter as ProgressiveInput stream, which does progress reporting.
      Returns:
      True if the copy succeeded.

    • copyAndClose

      public static boolean copyAndClose​(InputStream input, OutputStream output)
      Copy an input stream to an output stream. The streams will be automatically buffered for efficiency if they are not already buffered and when the operation completes, both streams will be closed.
      Returns:
      True if the copy succeeded.
